rows.label: qev091403_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello, Solan. It's been a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0002
rows.name: Sorry, who are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Oof.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0004
rows.name: Um, Phog?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ah, yes. Of course. I remember because you have
all the presence of your namesake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0006
rows.name: Uh, but you didn't remember.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0007
rows.name: Right, well. Apologies. Did you need me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0008
rows.name: Er, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0009
rows.name: We were attacked by a strange organism in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0010
rows.name: Some new bioweapon from the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0011
rows.name: We're not sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0012
rows.name:
We brought one back so you could take a look,
if you don't mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0013
rows.name: Sounds dangerous. I love it. Let's go take a look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0014
rows.name: Well then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0015
rows.name: A cursory analysis rules out the bioweapon theory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0016
rows.name: It's not Ganglion. Tech level is wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0017
rows.name: Meaning...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0018
rows.name: No clue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0019
rows.name: Could be another indigenous Miran species.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0020
rows.name: You know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0020_2
rows.name: One that lives only in Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0021
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0022
rows.name: Do you know about all those ruins over in that region?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's possible something in one of them
could help provide us with answers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0024
rows.name:
Why do I get the feeling the rest of my day
is going to be in ruins?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0025
rows.name:
A reasonable assumption! Anyway, there are three
likely sites, so you'll want to get on that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0026
rows.name:
I received the data you sent from the ruins.
I'll get started on it now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0027
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0028
rows.name: Sorry, but there's only one thing I can say for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0029
rows.name: And that is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0030
rows.name:
It's not a Ganglion weapon. Or native to Mira.
Oh, and it's not from Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0031
rows.name: That was three things, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0032
rows.name: Ah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0033
rows.name: Er, Phog? You still with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0034
rows.name: I understand it's less than we hoped for, but still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0035
rows.name: ...Brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire about Solan

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask whether Solan and Phog are brothers.

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire about Frye

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Phog if Frye is his brother.

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0036
rows.name: I think I'd remember a sibling this...colorful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0037
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0038
rows.name: Frye Christoph is my older brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0039
rows.name: It's...a bit of a long story. Do you mind listening?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you're all ears.

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0040
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Phog that you're too busy for soliloquies.

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0040
rows.name: Wow. Okay then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0041
rows.name:
You guys have come this far togetherâ€”
why not hear the kid out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0042
rows.name: Um...please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0043
rows.name: I'll be as brief as possible, but I really want you to hear this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0044
rows.name: ...Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0045
rows.name: First, let me apologize for not telling you about this sooner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0046
rows.name: My brother and I had a huge fight back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0047
rows.name:
The Christophs are a military family:
Frye, our father, his father, HIS father...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0048
rows.name: But I took after my late mother. I wanted to be an engineer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0049
rows.name: And though we were different, we were all still close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0050
rows.name:
But that all changed when it came time
to board the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0051
rows.name:
My father was the only one of us who didn't get a spot.
He stayed behind on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0052
rows.name:
Frye couldn't see how someone
with his experience and rank could be denied.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0053
rows.name: And he raised holy hell about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that Frye must have really loved their father.

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0060
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0061
rows.name: Mock Frye for his daddy issues.

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask why their father wasn't selected
for the Earthlife Colonization Project.

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0054
rows.name: Oh, yes. Dad was Frye's hero, in most respects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0055
rows.name: Er, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0056
rows.name: Frye got the daddy issues, and I got the brother issues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0057
rows.name: I know it seems strange, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0058
rows.name: Anyway, Frye had it wrong. Still does, I assume.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0059
rows.name: Unlike him, I accepted the truth immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0060
rows.name: I had no objection to leaving our father behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0061
rows.name:
Because that was his choice, you see,
and I wanted to respect his wishes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0062
rows.name:
He said an old man like him
had no place taking someone else's spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0063
rows.name: All his life, he'd sacrificed himself to keep others safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0064
rows.name:
This was no different,
except that it meant we'd never meet again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0065
rows.name:
But Frye wouldn't hear it.
He refused to listen to me or Dad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0066
rows.name: He's been bitter and distant ever since.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0080
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that you understand how he must have felt.

rows.label: qev091403_JNK0090
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev091403_SEL0091
rows.name:
Tell Phog that you know how hard
it must have been for him.

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0067
rows.name: So do I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0068
rows.name:
I'm probably strange for not trying
to change my father's mind, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0069
rows.name:
I'm just hoping that if I make a name for myself here,
I can speak to Frye as a peer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0070
rows.name: Maybe then, he'll finally listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0071
rows.name: Yes, it was. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0072
rows.name: I want us to be close again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0073
rows.name:
I'm hoping that if I keep pushing myself as a BLADE,
I can at least speak to Frye as a peer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0074
rows.name: Then maybe he'll finally listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0075
rows.name: Anyway, I really appreciate your help in all this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0076
rows.name:
Hmm... I can't make any progress until I have more
to work with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0077
rows.name:
With the data from those ruins in Oblivia,
I may be able to discern what that wreckage was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091403_MSG0078
rows.name: Please hurry, if you can.[ST:wait ]
